content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: Good afternoon, Mister Heine. Thank you for the opportunity to discuss the rental price of the apartment. I understand that you would like to offer me the lowest price possible, and I appreciate that. I am also a responsible and dependable student who is looking for a good rental arrangement. May I ask what the rental price you have in mind is?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content: I have a proposal for you. I would like to offer you a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This is the minimum I can offer, and I believe it is fair for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. I hope you will consider this proposal.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your proposal, Mister Heine. I appreciate the understanding that you are offering the lowest price possible, and I am willing to consider it. However, I would like to ask if there is any possibility to negotiate a lower rental price or if there are any additional services or amenities that could be included in the rental agreement? I am open to discussing any options that may be available.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi

content:
I am afraid I cannot negotiate any further. The apartment is already rented out, and I have no other properties to offer you any additional services or amenities. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. I hope you will consider my proposal of 500 Euros per month. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.

TERMINATE.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mister Heine. I appreciate the opportunity to discuss the rental price with you. I will consider your proposal of 500 Euros per month, but I am still looking for the lowest possible rental price. If there are any other properties or options available in the future, I will definitely reach out to you. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi
